casebody.data:
No. 314,

Misc.

McGee v. International Life Insurance Co.

Motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Civil Appeals of Texas, First Supreme Judicial District, *925granted.

Arthur J. Mandell for petitioner. Stanley Hornsby for respondent. The Chief Justice took no part in the consideration or decision of this application.
